entries.already_have_clone_data: You already have your clone data set here!
entries.already_have_similar_buff: You already have a similar effect active.
entries.apologize_for_inconvenience: We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.
entries.bank_prompt: Please select the amounts for each account.
entries.bank_to_escrow: An amount of %DI credits have been transferred from your bank to escrow.  It will be delivered to %TO as soon as possible.
entries.bind_removed: To enable selective clone respawn again, you must pay another clone data storage fee.
entries.bio_link_wrong_faction: You must be a member of the %TT faction to bio-link this item.
entries.bio_link_wrong_overt_faction: You must be an overt member of the %TT faction to bio-link this item.
entries.buff_applied: The effect of this item has been activated!
entries.cannot_offer_ride_to: You cannot offer a ride to that.
entries.cant_apply_buff: You already have a similar buff active.
entries.cant_tip_yourself: You can't use yourself as a target for /tip!
entries.cant_use_command_tutorial: You cannot use this command from within the tutorial.
entries.char_xfer_dl_fail_gender: Character transfer failed because your target character is not the same gender as the source character. Please try again with a character of the same gender as the source.
entries.char_xfer_dl_fail_species: Character transfer failed to complete. Your target character species does not match the source character species. Please try again with a character of the same species.
entries.clone_confirm_coupon_prompt: Will you use your cloning facility authorization release to clone yourself here?
entries.clone_confirm_prompt: Will you pay the %DI credits to clone yourself here?
entries.clone_fail_no_selection: You must select a cloning facility to go to.
entries.clone_prompt_detail_high: pcontrast3 High Cloning Damage! . - Your items will suffer a significantly higher amount of damage for cloning at an unregistered location.
entries.clone_prompt_detail_low: pcontrast2 Minimal Cloning Damage . - Your items will suffer a minimal amount of damage for cloning at your pre-registered location.
entries.clone_prompt_detail_noob: pcontrast1 New Player Exemption! . - Your items will not suffer any damage this time.  Be careful, dying will eventually damage your items.
entries.clone_prompt_detail_pvp_low: pcontrast2 Minimal Cloning Damage . - You have been killed in a PvP engagement.  Your items will suffer a minimal amount of damage for cloning at an unregistered location.
entries.clone_prompt_detail_pvp_none: pcontrast1 Zero Cloning Damage . - You have been killed in a PvP engagement.  Your items will suffer zero damage for cloning at your pre-registered location.
entries.clone_prompt_header: Select the desired clone location and click 'OK'.
entries.confirm_character_upload: You are about to upload your character information to the Star Wars Galaxies character transfer service. After the upload is complete, log into the target Galaxy with a character of the same gender and species, then use the /downloadCharacter command to retrieve the data and apply it to the target character. If you do not want to start this process now, simply select cancel or press ESC. Any player may transfer their character data to Test Center. This will not affect any characters already in use in other Galaxies. Character transfers elsewhere, however, require prior authorization and will result in the character being disabled in the Galaxy of origin.
entries.consent_from_listbox_prompt: You have consent from the following players:
entries.consent_list_full: Consent List Full: consent limit is %DI
entries.consent_to_listbox_prompt: You have granted consent to the following players:
entries.corpse_expired: A corpse of yours has expired into nothingness.
entries.corpse_looted: You have completely looted the corpse of all items.
entries.corpse_transaction_pending: A corpse transaction is in progress. Cleanup pending transaction completion.
entries.covercharge_dancer_message: Your covercharge of %DI credit(s) has been accepted by %TU, credits are tranferred when the customer stops watching.
entries.covert_respawn_outside: Because you have cloned outside of a facility, you have been reset to combatant status.
entries.covert_respawn_unaligned: Because you have cloned in a non-aligned facility, you have been reset to combatant status.
entries.covert_respawn_unfriendly: Because you have cloned in a factionally unfriendly facility, you have been reset to combatant status.
entries.spice_downer_duration_reduced: The effects of Smugglers Delight have somewhat countered the downer from the spice.
entries.defeated_bounty_hunter: You have defeated a bounty hunter, ruining his mission against you!
entries.download_fail: Character transfer was denied. If this is an error, please contact customer service for assistance.
entries.escrow_withdraw_failed: %TO attempted to transfer %DI credits to you via bank wire.  The transfer from escrow to your bank account failed.  %TO has been refunded.
entries.faction_points_needed_for_bio_link: You need %DI or more faction points to bio-link this item to yourself.
entries.failed_escrow_refund: Your attempt to transfer %DI credits to %TO via a bank wire failed.  The attempt to refund the money to you from an escrow account also failed.  Please contact a CSR for a manual refund.
entries.find_datapad_full: /Find was unable to create a waypoint. It is likely that your datapad is full.
entries.find_general_error: /Find was unable to complete your request. Please try again.
entries.find_path_started: Your find path has been started near the entrance of the structure you are currently in.
entries.find_prompt: Select a category of planetary map locations to search for.
entries.food_already_have_buff: You cannot consume that, you already have the enhancement effect.
entries.food_buff_not_owner: Only the person that created this edible may eat it.
entries.food_buff_wont_stack: You cannot consume that, the enhancement would not stack.
entries.food_burst_run_not_ready: You cannot consume that, you are not ready to burst run yet.
entries.food_no_eat_downer: You cannot consume that while recovering from negative spice effects.
entries.food_not_diseased: You cannot consume that, you are not diseased.
entries.food_not_poisoned: You cannot consume that, you are not poisoned.
entries.food_pet_only: That item is intended to be eaten by pets only.
entries.food_stomach_empty: You cannot consume that, you could not possibly be any hungrier.
entries.food_too_full: You cannot consume that, you are already too full.
entries.free_trial_level_cap: You have reached the max level of %DI. Free trial accounts cannot progress any further.
entries.fs_village_no_combat: You must find peace in order to pass through the wall of mist...
entries.fs_village_unavailable: A wall of swirling mist blocks your path.  Despite your best efforts, you cannot pass through it.  Perhaps you are not yet ready...
entries.gm_forced_you: A GM Forced you to do a command
entries.guildremove_not_in_guild: You are not in a guild.
entries.guildstatus_not_player: You may only check the guild status of players.
entries.guildstatus_player_not_found: That player was not found in the guild.
entries.have_coupon_not_auth: You have a cloning facility coupon, but are not the authorized user.
entries.have_coupon_not_valid: You have a cloning facility coupon, but it is not valid.
entries.haveconsent_false: You do not have their consent.
entries.instance_revive: Press OK to revive at the spawn point.
entries.invalid_coords_warp: Due to a system error involving invalid login coordinates, an attempt has been made to warp you to a local starport.  We apologize for the inconvenience.
entries.invite_to_ride: %TO would like to offer you a ride.
entries.item_bio_linked: The item is now bio-linked to you. No other player will be able to use it.
entries.item_not_owner: You are not the owner of this item.
entries.item_wrong_skill: You do not have the necessary skill to use this item.
entries.last_newbie_insure: New Player Exemption! You have one final death before items take damage from cloning.
entries.level_too_low: Your Combat Level is too low to use this item.
entries.level_too_low_for_effect: Your Combat Level is too low to gain the effect from this item.
entries.lightsaber_not_jedi: You must be force-sensitive to wield a lightsaber.
entries.loveday_crossbow_hate_reduced: The influence of the Ewok Festival of Love Crossbow causes your enemy to hate you a bit less.
entries.loveday_crossbow_no_target: You do not have a target.
entries.must_be_declared: You must be declared to a faction before you may use that command.
entries.must_bio_link_from_inventory: An item may only be bio-linked from your inventory.
entries.must_biolink_to_use_from_inventory: This is a bio-linked pending item. You must put it in your inventory and bio-link it to yourself before using it.
entries.must_equip_from_inventory: This is a bio-linked pending item. You must put it in your inventory and bio-link it to yourself before equipping it.
entries.newbie_expired: New player exemption has expired.  Your items will now take damage from cloning.  Damage will be minimized by always cloning at a facility that you have registered with.
entries.no_corpse_produced: No corpse was produced for you, since you did not have anything to leave behind.
entries.no_entry_while_mounted: You cannot enter a structure while on your mount.
entries.no_free_trial_barker: Free trial accounts cannot use the barker droid.
entries.no_need_to_heal: You do not need to be healed.
entries.no_room_for_passenger: There is not enough room available for another passenger.
entries.noob_confirm_insure_prompt: Due to new player exemptions, you do not need to insure items at this time. Do you wish to continue?
entries.not_correct_skill: You lack the required skill to use this item
entries.not_in_your_inventory: You can only activate this item from your inventory.
entries.not_linked: This item cannot be used unless it is Bio-Linked.
entries.not_linked_to_holder: This item has been Bio-Linked to another player and cannot be used by you.
entries.not_while_equipped: You must Un-Equip this item before you destroy it.
entries.not_while_in_combat: You cannot do that while in combat.
entries.not_yet: You will be able to use this item again in %DI seconds.
entries.only_tip_valid_targets: You may only /tip to valid player targets!
entries.prose_award_faction: You have been awarded %DI points of %TO faction standing.
entries.prose_coa_bonus: You receive a Cries of Alderaan Bonus of %DI %TO faction points.
entries.prose_consent_already_consenting: You have already granted consent to %TO
entries.prose_consent_list_full: Your consent list is full (%DI players)
entries.prose_covert_uncloak: A %TT has cross-referenced you as a covert %TO operative.
entries.prose_deposit_success: You successfully deposit %DI credits to your account.
entries.prose_find_set: An active waypoint has been set to the nearest '%TO'.
entries.prose_find_unfound: /Find was unable to locate a '%TO' near you.
entries.prose_find_unknown_arg: /Find was unable to parse a category for '%TO'.
entries.prose_grant_buff_xp: You earned %DI %TO experience points. (%TT% inspiration bonus)
entries.prose_grant_group_buff_xp: You earned %DI %TO experience points. (%TT% group bonus, %TU% inspiration bonus)
entries.prose_grant_group_xp: You earned %DI %TO experience points. (%TT% group bonus)
entries.prose_grant_xp_bonus: pcontrast3 MASTER PILOT BONUS: < pcontrast1 You earned bonus %TO experience. pcontrast3 >
entries.prose_hit_xp_cap: You have achieved your current limit for %TO experience.
entries.prose_lose_faction: You have lost %DI points of %TO faction standing!
entries.prose_max_faction: You cannot gain any more of %TO faction standing.
entries.prose_min_faction: You cannot lose any more of %TO faction standing.
entries.prose_mission_xp_amount: COMPNOR has awarded you an additional reward of9932CC %DIFFFFFF experience for completing your mission.  The Imperial Security Bureau division of COMPNOR authorizes9932CC %TTFFFFFF more experience payouts per this galactic day.
entries.prose_newbie_insured: New Player Exemption!  You have %DI more deaths before items take damage from cloning.
entries.prose_nsf_skill_pts: You do not have enough skill points left to learn skill '%TO'.
entries.prose_pay_acct_success: You successfully make a payment of %DI credits to %TO.
entries.prose_pay_success: You successfully make a payment of %DI credits to %TT.
entries.prose_pay_success_no_target: You successfully make a payment of %DI credits.
entries.prose_tef: You have gained a temporary enemy flag toward the %TO faction.
entries.prose_tip_nsf_bank: You lack the bank funds to wire %DI credits to %TT.
entries.prose_tip_nsf_cash: You lack the cash funds to tip %DI credits to %TT.
entries.prose_tip_nsf_wire: You do not have %DI credits (surcharge included) to tip the desired amount to %TT.
entries.prose_tip_range: You are too far away to tip %TT with cash.  You can send a wire transfer instead.
entries.prose_transfer_success: %DI credits have been successfully transferred to your account.
entries.prose_victim_dead: You were slain by %TT. Requesting clone activation...
entries.prose_wire_mail_self: %TO has received %DI credits from you, via bank wire transfer.
entries.prose_wire_mail_target: %DI credits from %TO have been successfully delivered from escrow to your bank account.
entries.prose_wire_pass_self: You have successfully sent %DI bank credits to %TO.
entries.prose_wire_pass_target: You have successfully received %DI bank credits from %TO.
entries.prose_withdraw_success: You successfully withdraw %DI credits from your account.
entries.received_escrow_refund: Your attempt to transfer %DI credits to %TO via a bank wire failed.  The money has been refunded to you (minus transfer fee) from the escrow account.
entries.received_gift: You have received a chapter gift!
entries.revive_exp_msg: Your resuscitation timer will expire in %TT
entries.revive_exp_msg_last: Your resuscitation timer will expire and you will automatically clone at the first available facility in %TT
entries.revive_expired: Your resuscitation timer has expired. You are being automatically cloned at the first available facility.
entries.revive_msg: Click OK when you are ready to be returned to your clone.
entries.sale_fee: The fee for your listing is %DI credits.
entries.skill_template_item_reward: pcontrast3 Roadmap Reward: < pcontrast1 %TO pcontrast3 > has been placed in your inventory.
entries.skill_template_no_xp_nag: You do not have a Working Skill.  No XP will be awarded until you select a Working Skill.
entries.skill_template_old_xp_nag: You have not changed your Working Skill.  Please select a new working skill.
entries.skillmod_applied: The skill modification has been applied.
entries.smuggler_scan_fail: You have failed to avoid the scan.
entries.smuggler_scan_success: You have successfully evaded the scan.
entries.special_sign_failed: Special Sign Placement Failed.  Notify Customer Service.
entries.special_sign_removed: Sign replaced with default structure sign.
entries.special_sign_revert_success: Sign appearance reverted to default sign.
entries.special_sign_ui_prompt: Select an option for this structure's sign below.
entries.species_cannot_equip: You cannot biolink an item that you cannot equip.
entries.sui_bind_prompt_cash: Closest:              %TO Pre-Designated: %TT Cash Balance:     %DI  Select the desired option and click OK.
entries.sui_bind_prompt_newbie: Closest:              %TO Pre-Designated: %TT NEW PLAYER EXEMPTION ACTIVE!!  Select the desired option and click OK.
entries.sui_consent_from_header: You have consent from the following players:
entries.sui_consented_list_header: You have granted consent to the following players:
entries.sui_decay_report_prompt_nonpvp: The following report summarizes the status of your items after the decay event.
entries.sui_decay_report_prompt_pvp: The following report summarizes the status of your items after the decay event.  Because your clone was activated due to player-vs-player conflict, your insured items will not be uninsured during the decay event.
entries.sui_insurance_menu_prompt: Select an item and click OK to insure that item. Alternately, click ALL to insure all items.  Insure All Cost: %DI
entries.sui_insured_items: The following are your insured items
entries.sui_pay_access_fee_prompt: In order to enter this building, you must pay an access fee of %DI credits.  Hit OK to pay the access fee or CANCEL to abort.
entries.sui_uninsured_items: The following are your uninsured items:
entries.tip_error: There was an error processing your /tip request. Please try again.
entries.tip_nsf: It appears that you have insufficient cash credits to tip that much.
entries.tip_target_offline: You cannot tip someone who is not online.
entries.tip_wire_prompt: A surcharge of 5% will be added to your requested bank-to-bank transfer amount. Would you like to continue?
entries.too_many_waypoints: Could not create waypoint.  Either you have too many waypoints in your datapad, or the coordinates given are not valid.
entries.unable_to_accept_ride: That target was unable to accept the ride.
entries.unable_to_create_path: The system was unable to create a client path for you.
entries.unique_failed_create: You cannot possess more than one of these items.
entries.unique_no_transfer: This Unique item may only be placed in your bank or top level of your inventory.
entries.upload_fail: The character transfer failed to upload your character data. If this is an error, please contact customer service for assistance.
entries.upload_success: Your character has been successfully uploaded. You may now log into the target Galaxy and attempt to complete this transfer. If this transfer is to a Galaxy other than Test Center, you may need additional authorization and your source character may be disabled.
entries.victim_dead: You have died. Requesting clone activation...
entries.waypoint_created_at_loc: Waypoint: New waypoint created for location %DI, %TO.
entries.wrong_player_per_biolink: This item has been bio-linked by another player and cannot be used.
entries.you_do_not_have_consent: You do NOT have consent from %TT.
entries.you_do_not_qualify: You do not qualify to use this terminal.
entries.spice_downer_duration_negated: The effects of Smugglers Delight have countered the downer from the spice.
entries.incapacitation_duration_reduced: Your resuscitation timer has been modified due to the Cavaellin Creams you consumed.
entries.food_over_max_duration: You cannot consume that, the cumulative duration would exceed two hours.
entries.beast_buff_not_owner: Only the person that created this item may use it.
entries.beast_buff_level_too_low: Your Beast's Combat Level is too low to use this item.
entries.beast_buff_cant_apply_buff: Your Beast already have a similar buff active.
entries.beast_buff_no_active_beast: You do not have an active beast on which to use this item.
entries.buff_removed: The effect of this item has been deactivated.
entries.beast_buff_beast_dead: Your beast is deceased and no longer has any interest in this buff.
